trans-unit.source: An error occurred
trans-unit.target: Prišlo je do napake

trans-unit.source: What's the matter?
trans-unit.target: Kaj se je zgodilo?

trans-unit.source: How can I fix the issue?
trans-unit.target: Kako lahko odpravim napako?

trans-unit.source: Tell me more, please
trans-unit.target: Želim izvedeti več

trans-unit.source: To customize this notice, create a custom Twig template overriding %s.
An error occurred while executing this script. Something does not work properly.
trans-unit.target: Med izvajanjem te skripte je prišlo do napake. Nekaj ne deluje pravilno.

trans-unit.source: Open the current log file in the var/logs or app/logs directory and find the associated error message (usually the last one).

The script execution stopped, because something does not work properly. The actual error message is hidden by this notice for security reasons and can be found in the current log file (see above). If you do not understand the error message or do not know how to fix the problem, search the Contao FAQs or visit the Contao support page.
Invalid request token
trans-unit.target: Neveljaven žeton

trans-unit.source: The request token could not be verified.
trans-unit.target: Žetona ni bilo moč preveriti.

trans-unit.source: Please click this link and try again. Do not use the back button of your browser.
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, sledite tej povezavi in poskusite znova. Ne uporabite gumba Nazaj v vašem brskalniku.

trans-unit.source: This error occurs if there is a POST request without a valid authentication token. In Contao 2.10, the referer check has been replaced with a request token system. If the problem persists, you may be using an incompatible third-party extension or have not correctly updated your Contao installation.
trans-unit.target: Ta napaka se pojavi, kadar je bila POST zahteva izvedena brez veljavnega avtentikacijskega žetona. V Contao 2.10 različici je bilo preverjanje napotitelja zamenjano z žetonskim sistemom. Če se težava ponavlja, je razlog mogoče v nezdružljivem dodatku tretjega ponudnika ali pa Contao namestitev ni bila pravilno posodobljena.

trans-unit.source: For more information, search the Contao FAQs or visit the Contao support page.
trans-unit.target: Za več informacij, preiščite Contao FAQs ali obiščite Contao stran za podporo uporabnikom.

trans-unit.source: Incomplete installation
trans-unit.target: Nedokončana namestitev

trans-unit.source: The installation has not been completed, therefore Contao cannot work properly.
trans-unit.target: Namestitev ni bila zaključena, zato Contao ne bo deloval pravilno.

trans-unit.source: Please open the Contao install tool (/contao/install) in your browser.
For more information, please refer to the Contao manual.
trans-unit.target: Za več informacij obiščite Contao priročnik.

trans-unit.source: Forward page not found
trans-unit.target: Preusmeritvene strani ni mogoče najti

trans-unit.source: The application has been configured to forward the request to another page, however, the target page does not exist or has not been published.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacija je bila nastavljena tako, da posreduje zahtevo na drugo stran, žal pa ciljna stran ne obstaja ali še ni bila objavljena.

trans-unit.source: This is something that needs to be fixed by the administrator of the website. If you are a visitor, there is nothing you can do except to contact the webmaster to let him know that there is something wrong.
trans-unit.target: To je nekaj, kar mora popraviti administrator spletne strani. Če ste obiskovalec, žal ne morete storiti ničesar, razen da kontaktirate administratorja, ter ga obvestite, da je nekaj s stranjo narobe.

trans-unit.source: No root page found
trans-unit.target: Ne najdem začetne strani.

trans-unit.source: There is no website root page which matches the requested language and/or domain name.
trans-unit.target: Ne obstaja korenska stran, ki bi se ujemala z zahtevanim jezikom in/ali imenom domene.

trans-unit.source: If you have explicitly set a language, try to go to the top level and see whether you are being redirected. Otherwise contact the webmaster and let him know that there is something wrong.
trans-unit.target: Če ste izrecno nastavili jezik, poskušajte obiskati na najvišji nivo in preverite ali ste pravilno preusmerjeni. V nasprotnem primeru kontaktirajte administratorja in ga obvestite, da je nekaj šlo narobe.

trans-unit.source: No layout specified
trans-unit.target: Postavitev strani ni določena

trans-unit.source: The page you have requested has not yet been associated with a page layout.
trans-unit.target: Zahtevana stran še ni bila povezana s postavitvijo strani.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you have assigned a page layout to each website root page in the site structure.
trans-unit.target: Preverite, ali ste določili postavitev strani vsem vrhnjim stranem v strukturi spletnega mesta.

trans-unit.source: For more information, please refer to the Contao manual.
trans-unit.target: Za več informacij se obiščite Contao priročnik.

trans-unit.source: No active pages found
trans-unit.target: Nobena aktivna stran ni najdena.

trans-unit.source: Your request has been mapped to a website which does not yet contain any published pages.
trans-unit.target: Vaša zahteva je povezana s spletno stranjo, ki zaenkrat ne vsebuje objavljenih strani.

trans-unit.source: Most likely, the website is still under development and will be online in a few days. If you still think that there is something wrong, contact the webmaster and let him know.
trans-unit.target: Najverjetneje je spletna stran še vedno v izgradnji in bo objavljena v nekaj dneh. Če še vedno mislite, da je nekaj narobe,

trans-unit.source: Service unavailable
trans-unit.target: Storitev ni na voljo

trans-unit.source: The website is currently not available. Please come back later.
trans-unit.target: Spletno mesto trenutno ni na voljo. Prosimo, poskusite kasneje.

trans-unit.source: Insecure document root
Your installation is not secure, because non-public resources are publicy available via HTTP.
Please set the document root to the web/ subfolder. This is usually done in the domain routing section of your server administration panel or in the vhosts file of your web server.

Contao 4 no longer relies on .htaccess files to protect folders and instead uses a public subfolder as document root. Anything above the document root must not be accessible via HTTP, otherwise anyone could download non-public resources including sensitive data such as configuration files.
